awd_titl_txt: Convinuous Production of Proteins in Bacillus:  Secretion byVegetative Cells
awd_abstract_narration: The objective of this proposal is to demonstrate the                            feasibility of modifying Bacillus expression systems which                      will allow vegetative cells to continuously produce and                         secrete proteins.  Very little is known about the                               capabilities of vegetative cells to synthesize and secrete                      proteins.  The modified expression systems could serve as a                     basis for new recombinant DNA technology for efficient                          production of commercially important Bacillus exoenzymes and                    heterologous foreign proteins.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: UNIVERSITY OF PITTSBURGH - OF THE COMMONWEALTH SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION
